title: Grand Suite
short_info: The Grand Suites offer Manhattan views and range in sizes of 1,300 square feet to 2,000 square feet, four-fixture bathrooms and separate pantry kitchens. These suites are located throughout the hotel.
room_features:
Room Features

The Grand Suites are luxurious and sophisticated two-bedroom offering views of Manhattan’s prestigious Upper East Side. 

Bed & Bath Experience

An entry foyer complements the regal living / dining room. A comfortable sofa, two side tables, coffee table, two exquisitely upholstered armchairs, and two ottomans adorn the grand suite. A dining table that seats four to six guests, an executive desk with chair, a wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace with console and minibar forms part of the suite. The grand suite is complemented by a well-appointed pantry kitchen for private gatherings.

The suites are comprised of two bedrooms. The master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two nightstands, an armchair with side table and Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock.

The second bedroom is comprised of twin beds, one nightstand between the two beds and console with a 40” TV. Four fixture Turkish marble clad bathrooms features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
service_amenities:
Grand Suite privileges include full American Breakfast at Perrine or through Room Service, Complimentary pressing of 5 garments upon arrival, Complimentary juices and soft drinks from the minibar, Direct private phone number to our Concierge Team, reserved for Grand Suite guests. Additional hotel services also include 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants and Complimentary Jaguar house car  subject to availability.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 5 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, Complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
